data.title: Can't find 3.7 min.js
data.body:
Hi, I just downloaded 3.7, and I can't find a prebuilt min.js anywhere.
cocos2d-js v3.6.1 had a cocos2d-js-v3.6-min.js located in frameworks/cocos2d-html5/lib

Will you be adding this back in for future releases?

Bruce

data.title: 3.x 通过tolua自动导出到lua的C++函数异常检查的问题（原谅我无法reopen，很重要所以再次提出）
Fixing typos in create_project.py
data.body: Fixing typos in comments and printed messages of the project creation script (create_project.py) for cocos2d-x v2 branch.

data.title: C++ template project style differs from JS template project
data.body:
When creating a new JS project, a sample HelloWorldScene is created and that scene creates a HelloWorldLayer. From a hierarchical standpoint this makes a lot of sense: the layer is a child of the scene so the scene creates the layer.

In the C++ project this is not the case. The layer creates the scene which puts an odd dependency on the layer which should not be there in my opinion.

Could the C++ sample project be changed so it looks more like the JS sample project? I personally find the JS version a lot easier to build apps upon.

data.title: Fixed a compile error when CC_SPRITE_DEBUG_DRAW is on

milestone.title: v3.7.1
milestone.description:
This version is about to release with Cocos v2.3.2.
The core feature is Skeleton Animation support for Cocos Studio
It will provide Skeleton Animation for TimelineAction, its cpp/json parser, Lua/JS bindings,  web implementation.

This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

This version is about to release with Cocos v2.3.2.
The core feature is Skeleton Animation support for Cocos Studio
It will provide Skeleton Animation for TimelineAction, its cpp/json parser, Lua/JS bindings,  web implementation.

Some 3d classes can't be constructed with new in JS

Some 3d classes can't be constructed with new in JS
add the Classes that can be constructed with new but not done yet:
relate issue https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/12404

data.title: Lua XMLHttpRequest getResponseHeader
data.body: getResponseHeader("Server")

data.title: Callback gets called no matter where I touch!
3.7版本的CC_ENABLE_BULLET_INTEGRATION宏的继承问题
data.body:
CC_ENABLE_BULLET_INTEGRATION=1在cocos2d-x DLL中启用，但是继承项目中并没有添加这个宏，导致主项目引用DLL时，实际编译头文件忽略了 Physics3DWorld\* 和 Camera*两个指针，DLL外进行Scene类内寻址_Physics3DWorld成员之后的变量全部出错。

另外，Scene还重定义覆盖了Node中的 PhysicsWorld\* _physicsWorld成员。
